text: Rantso Alfred Mokopane (born 8 August 1994) is a South African runner specialising in the 3000 metres steeplechase. He won silver medals at the 2017 and 2019 Summer Universiade. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2016 |African Championships |Durban, South Africa |7th |3000 m s'chase |8:35.02 |- |rowspan=2|2017 |rowspan=2|Universiade |rowspan=2|Taipei, Taiwan |11th |1500 m |3:47.97 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |3000 m s'chase |8:36.25 |- |rowspan=2|2019 |Universiade |Naples, Italy |bgcolor=silver|2nd |3000 m s'chase |8:30.37 |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |41st (h) |3000 m s'chase |8:42.22 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *800 metres – 1:53.41 (Pretoria 2014) *1500 metres – 3:38.83 (Cape Town 2017) *One mile – 3:58.92 (Paarl 2018) *3000 metres – 7:57.40 (Nembro 2019) *5000 metres – 14:05.04 (Cape Town 2017) *3000 metres steeplechase – 8:30.37 (Naples 2019) *10 kilometres – 30:03 (Durban 2017) ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:South African male steeplechase runners Category:Universiade silver medalists for South Africa Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Medalists at the 2017 Summer Universiade Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Rantso Mokopane
